Text: Welcome to newsreleases Welcome to the newsreleases mailing list Please save this message for future reference Thank you If you ever want to remove yourself from this mailing list you can send mail to with the following command in the body of your email message unsubscribe newsreleases or from another account besides unsubscribe newsreleases If you ever need to get in contact with the owner of the list if you have trouble unsubscribing or have questions about the list itself send email to This is the general rule for most mailing lists when you need to contact a human Heres the general information for the list youve subscribed to in case you dont already have it Please change your font to Courier for best appearance W E L C O M E T O T H E California Energy Commission News Release Automated Mailing List Your subscription to the NEWS RELEASE MAILING LIST has been accepted This mailing list was set up by the California Energy Commission as a way to electronically distribute Commission News Releases to the media and other interested parties This mailing list will also be used to distribute media advisories documents and notices of special interest to the media This is a moderated oneway mailing list Email can only be sent out from the List Administrator to subscribers Subscribers are not able to correspond with the rest of the list as in other mailing lists Please note that if you change your email address or wish to stop receiving messages please send an unsubscribe message see below Also some corporate Local Area Network firewalls may prevent you from receiving automated email or email attachments Please check with your companys computer services or information technology personnel before subscribing IMPORTANT INFORMATION ABOUT THE MAILING LIST Please save this message for future reference especially if you are not familiar with list servers You may want to create a new mail folder for subscription confirmation messages like this one and for other messages from the list owner that you may occasionally receive after subscribing to this list LEAVING THE LIST UNSUBSCRIBING FROM THE LIST You may leave the list at any time by sending the words unsubscribe newsreleases in the body of your email without the quotes and send to Do not put any words in the subject or reference line of your email And turn off any signature block COMMANDS FOR THE LIST SERVER You can issue other commands to the list server by sending them to the list server address Some examples are To In body of email type in help Sends summaries of all majordomo commands info newsreleases Sends this introduction to the news releases mailing list YOUR NAME ON THE LIST Please note that it is possible for other people to determine that you are signed up to the list through the use of the who command which returns the email addresses of all the subscribers IF YOU HAVE OTHER QUESTIONS If you have questions about the list send them to Bob Aldrich the List Administrator at If you have technical questions about the List Server please send them to Barry Brown the Majordomo Administrator Thank you California Energy Commission Media Public Communications Office
